segments.text: Hi Paul . How are you , friend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not good . My cousin is driving me up the wall .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He stays up untill all hours of the night , and he never lifts a finger to help .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you talk to him about it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not yet , but I have to soon . He's eating me out of house and home . I caught him reading the fridge again last night
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ahahah , Maybe that will help you lose weight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is no laughing matter , Nick .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry Paul . I couldn't help it . So why doesn't he give you a hand ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He watch the tob too much . Now really I don't know . But I can't handle this much longer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , talk to him , and let me know what happens , OK ?
segments.speaker: S1
